c74object.name: tap.radians~
c74object.description: The tap.radians~ object performs unit conversions for working with trigonometric values in radians. For a thorough treatment of unit conversion, the jcom.dataspace object in Jamoma is recommended.

method.name: float
method.description: float input is process, just like signals, and the converted output is sent to the second outlet.

attribute.name: mode
attribute.description: Determines what kind of calculation will be performed. The available options are: hz-to-radians, radians-to-hertz, degrees-to-radians, radians-to-degrees.
